headline: Death of a Charity Leader Rattles Brooklyn Neighbors
abstract: L. Antonio Litman, who recently bought hoverboards for children in the neighborhood, was found dead after an overnight blaze at his home.
lead_paragraph: L. Antonio Litman was a fixture in his Brooklyn community, known for his generosity. He ran a charity that provided meals and college scholarships to needy families, and for Christmas he bought hoverboards for children in his neighborhood.
